title: svAmi sharaNam
sahitya:
svAmi sharaNam rAma


caraNam 1    sakala carAcara nAyakanE en
   caraNam 2    ahamum puramum engum niraiyum manOharanE
   caraNam 3    iravu paghalaim unai ninaindu ninaindu manam
   uruginEn tiruvuLam ariyum enadarumai
   caraNam 4    abalaiyaik-kaN pArAi abhaya karam tArAi aramillaiyA
  tiruvaruL illaiyA manam illaiyA innum dayavillaiyA en
